HP DL380 G10 Server LED's blinking and not starting
I have the a issue couple of days back in my server, where i restarted server few days back. When i shut down server and after that all the LED's on front panel started blinking together. The server is not starting.

Re: HP DL380 G10 Server LED's blinking and not starting
[@AnilGupta]wrote:I have the a issue couple of days back in my server, where i restarted server few days back. When i shut down server and after that all the LED's on front panel started blinking together. The server is not starting.
Hello!
When the LEDs on your HP DL380 G10 server blink together and the server doesn't start, it often indicates a hardware issue. Check power connections, reseat components like RAM and CPUs, and replace the CMOS battery if necessary. Use iLO to check event logs and run HPE's diagnostic tools to identify hardware failures.

Re: HP DL380 G10 Server LED's blinking and not starting
[@Christin602Bey](/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/2365948)Thanks for your response !
I already did CMOS battery change, plugged out and plugged in RAM again. For ILO, the IP was configured by earlier team and we are not able to see the IP details, is there any process to reset it if you can advise, else i will see how i can do that and take hardware diagnostic logs and see what is the issue.
